Entries.Sun2: Shaylin's a good buddy of mine.#$b#We both go hang around the lake to drink sometimes.$h#$b#She's a little cranky, but she's a good guy.

Entries.Mon8: Dad got angry at me and Trinnie yesterday.$s#$e#We tried to tape a "kick me" sign on Shaylin's back.$h#$b#Jas got angry at us too.$s#$e#We shouldn't have done that.$s

Entries.Wed6: You know, some days Shaylin reminds me of myself when I was her age...$s

Entries.Sun6: Keahi's giving me a headache!$a#$b#That boy actually taped a 'Kick Me' sign on Shaylin's back.$a#$b#Poor girl must've been kicked in her tush real good for her to storm in here.$s#$e#But just between you and me, that was pretty hilarious.$h

Entries.Resort_Bar: Shaylin had a few too many once and told me that I needed to try this mixed drink, but I can't remember the name of it...

Entries.Sun6: Hahaha, you should've seen Vincent try to kick Shaylin! Ha ha!$h#$e#Keahi and I played a prank on her!
Entries.Mon8: Mr. Pika got mad at me and Keahi yesterday because of a prank we pulled on Shaylin, and Jas won't talk to us.$s#$e#I felt bad yesterday, but now I feel better.#$b#Keahi hugged me when I cried last night.$4
